title: Make sure all SFX are open source for commercial use
description: Audit all audio assets under Assets/_Project/Audio/ to verify licensing is compatible with commercial release.

title: Bug: Enemies spawning on top of each other
description: Enemies spawn at overlapping positions. Need spawn point spacing or overlap check before instantiation.

title: Impact SFX for 3 basic enemies getting hit
description: Each of the 3 basic enemy types needs a unique hit impact sound effect.

title: Create a build
Bug: Towers float and don't shoot
description: Tower enemies have incorrect gravity or ground detection, causing them to float. Attack behavior is also non-functional.

title: Add VTT (voice-to-text) integration
Pseudo-ending narrative design: wave 100 boss, endless horde trigger, absorb power arc
Wave system design: enemy counts, types, boss intervals, progressive difficulty, infinite scaling
Add a boss enemy
description: Create a boss enemy using BossController phase system. Needs EnemyData, attacks, phase thresholds, and integration with GameManager.EnterBossFight().

title: Bug: Enemies and player push each other around
description: Player and enemies physically push each other via rigidbody collisions. Should either treat each other as immovable or allow pass-through with contact damage.

title: Enemies should have sound effects (idle, alert, attack, death)
description: Enemy prefabs need SFX for idle, alert, attack, hurt, and death states. EnemyData has fields for these but they may not be wired up.

title: Combat SFX for new basic skills
description: Each basic skill needs attack/cast SFX. Source open-source commercially-licensed audio.

title: Ensure waves 1-10 exist with proper enemy configurations
description: Verify WaveConfig ScriptableObjects exist for waves 1-10 with appropriate enemy pools, counts, and scaling.

title: Bug: Enemies randomly teleport away then reappear
description: Enemies sporadically teleport to distant positions and then reappear. Likely Animator overriding physics position or state machine transition issue.

title: Add basic skills for each class
description: Implement basic combat skills for each player class. Should integrate with the ability system and input bindings.

title: Game over sound effect
description: Add a game over SFX that plays when GameManager transitions to GameOver state.

title: Add credits screen
Review markdown files to ensure context issue is addressed
Change Rogue stat scaling: remove speed, add attack speed and crit multiplication
description: Rogue speed stat currently increases move speed. Should instead increase attack speed and crit damage multiplier.

title: Bug: No SFX on enemy hit
description: Hitting enemies produces no sound effect. Check EnemyData.hurtSound assignment and SFXManager playback integration.

title: Implement parry system (Fighter/Mage/Rogue variants)
description: Fighter: classic parry. Mage: spell mirror/arcane ward. Rogue: shadow step/precision dodge. Each class gets a unique defensive mechanic.

title: Set up linter
Slimes need to jump
description: Slime enemies should use a hopping movement pattern instead of ground patrol. May need a new HoppingMovement class or modification to GroundPatrolMovement.
